com.trogdadr2tr.game

Class GameRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.trogdadr2tr.game.GameRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameRoom
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.io.Serializable
    Runs the engines managing resource generation, unit movement, building and unit placement, and player movement. Sends and receives data to and from 5 clients, and keeps track of their roles in the game.
    Author:
    Colt Rogness
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
